ComicInfo.Title: Clan Building: Chapter 4 Masks
ComicInfo.Summary: Despite the awkwardness between Elisa and Goliath the Halloween party seems to be going well... until Thailog shows up that is.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:16:14. [CVDB113250] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 12:03:08. [Issue ID 381889]
